text: @DailyCaller @PressSec White House press corp very upset when Press Secretary Kayleigh Mcenany read quotes from Jan/Feb of The NY Times, Wa Post, VOX and the rest of them saying that the Coronavirus wasn't coming here, wasn't as bad as the flu and was nothing to worry about. #FakeNews
